divs: Sighting DetailsI use a Celestron CPC-800 telescope and Nikon D60 D-SLR to produce digital images of the lunar surface. I have numerous images of airborne objects near the lunar surface. Most are saucer shaped and show light signatures. They would have to be quite large craft, in my opinion. See attached photos.
Summary: I USE A CELESTRON TELESCOPE TO SNAP LUNAR IMAGES
